scripts.build: browserify webmap.js -o public/javascripts/webmap.js & browserify webmap2.js -o public/javascripts/webmap2.js & browserify webmap3.js -o public/javascripts/webmap3.js & cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css public/stylesheets/leaflet.css & cp node_modules/leaflet.markercluster/dist/MarkerCluster.css public/stylesheets/MarkerCluster.css & cp node_modules/leaflet.markercluster/dist/MarkerCluster.Default.css public/stylesheets/MarkerCluster.Default.css & cp -R node_modules/leaflet/dist/images public/stylesheets/images
